Aug. 31, 1863 D Cheltenham Pleasure Grounds, Harrogate, Contest
Cheltenham Pleasure Grounds (Harrogate) Contest 0 Other
cheltenham-pleasure-grounds-harrogate-contest
Cheltenham Pleasure Grounds, Harrogate See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm
The band of the Harrogate Rifle Volunteers played with the others, but did not compete.
Prizes: 1st: £20 and a silver cup 2nd: £10 3rd: £6 4th: £4 Best soloist: C. Joicey, Leyburn Second best soloist: Ackroyd Horner, Bradford
July 12, 2011, 12:47 p.m. July 19, 2011, 11:04 p.m.
